roleset.name: to organize

example.name: arbitrary subject
example.text: Several moves were taken following the October 1987 crash to coordinate -- and sometimes deliberately disconnect -- the stock and futures markets in times of heightened volatility .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Under the accord , Finnair agreed to coordinate flights , marketing and other functions with SAS , the 50%-state - owned airline of Denmark , Norway and Sweden .

propbank.arg: with SAS , the 50%-state - owned airline of Denmark , Norway and Sweden

example.name: Arg0 and 1
example.text: The Parks Department 's coordination of the Harvest Festival was mostly successful .

roleset.note: COORDINATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'coordinate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from coordinate.01-v predicate notes)
COORDINATION-N NOTES: Corresponds to coordinate.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from coordination.01-n)
